publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-32 Margaret Jamieson: Recognition of the Role of Nursery Nurses—That the Parliament recognises the important and expanding role of nursery nurses in the pre-five sector; further recognises the demands placed on nursery nurses in ensuring continual professional development to meet registration requirements, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to work with COSLA to reach agreement with UNISON on behalf of nursery nurses. Supported by: Pauline McNeill*, Janis Hughes*, Karen Whitefield*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Kate Maclean*, Cathie Craigie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*
S2M-32 Recognition of the Role of Nursery Nurses (lodged on 14 May 2003) Scott Barrie*R, Jackie Baillie*

S2M-32 Margaret Jamieson: Recognition of the Role of Nursery Nurses—That the Parliament recognises the important and expanding role of nursery nurses in the pre-five sector; further recognises the demands placed on nursery nurses in ensuring continual professional development to meet registration requirements, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to work with COSLA to reach agreement with UNISON on behalf of nursery nurses. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Janis Hughes, Karen Whitefield, Mr John Home Robertson, Kate Maclean, Cathie Craigie, Marilyn Livingstone, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Scott Barrie R, Jackie Baillie
S2M-32 Recognition of the Role of Nursery Nurses (lodged on 14 May 2003) Mark Ballard*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-32 Recognition of the Role of Nursery Nurses (lodged on 14 May 2003) Irene Oldfather*, Sarah Boyack*

S2M-32 Recognition of the Role of Nursery Nurses (lodged on 14 May 2003) Susan Deacon*, Eleanor Scott*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Karen Gillon*R, Robert Brown*, Elaine Smith*, Bill Butler*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-32 Recognition of the Role of Nursery Nurses (lodged on 14 May 2003) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-32 Recognition of the Role of Nursery Nurses (lodged on 14 May 2003) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
